content: make and join four simple double_crochet granny squares to create a cozy cocoon cardigan with a fun color-blocked design caron® x pantone™ yarn braids take the guesswork out of pairing colors so you can focus on stitching to fit bust measurement xs/s/m 28-38 71-96 5 cm l/xl/2xl 40-48 101 5-122 cm 3/4/5xl 54-62 137-157 5 cm
